CustomField.description: Based on baby's due date, determines the best shipping method. Twins and Triplets always ship Priority Overnight. Due Date within 1 month = Priority Overnight; 1 month to 2 months = 2nd Day Air; Greater than 2 months = Ground
CustomField.formula: IF( CONTAINS(Product_Lookup__r.Name, "twins"), "PRIORITY_OVERNIGHT", IF( CONTAINS(Product_Lookup__r.Name, "triplets"), "PRIORITY_OVERNIGHT", IF(Babys_Due_Date__c-TODAY()<31, "PRIORITY_OVERNIGHT", IF(Babys_Due_Date__c-TODAY()>60, "FEDEX_GROUND","FEDEX_2_DAY"))))
CustomField.label: Shipping Method
